title: Access 2007 - who has it?
description:
I thought I had Access as part of my office installation... I don't. I don't see where I can acquire access 2007 or office 2007 products.

Am I the only one with this problem?

Is there anyway we can come up with a solution to this. Does anyone have an old installation CD that we can pass around or something so that we can be productive in the tool of choice?

I went ahead and sent an email to Paul suggesting that this may be an issue to see if he could come up with a solution for us.

You can contact me at batainer@gmail.com

Betsy (flannel shirt and reading glasses)
